Desc.entry: Low cost session open to all adults and children (accompanied by adults) from beginners through to experienced runners. Running in a group helps to keep people motivated and makes running fun. Session is delivered by a qualified UK Athletics coach. Wear loose clothing, running trainers and bring a drink.

DisabledAccess.entry: Induction loop only in Community hall, level floor access throughout, Braille signage, car parking, free hire of mobility scooter - book in advance on Tel 286 0400
